name: Love, War, What is it Good For?
name_original: Love, War, What is it Good For?
description:
Speak with soldiers of various creeds and race before they depart into battle. Some return, some do not. Build the best relationships you can in the time you have.

CONTROLS

 Movement: WASD 

Talk: Q

Enter: Continue text box

Space(Hold):Speed up text box

Left Mouse Button: Select dialogue responses
